Texto: 
multiple cardiac and renal masses
anti seizure medications adjusted.
• enlarging mass foramen of monroe on right
• mass almost doubled in size in past 12 months
• subependymal nodules and cortical tubers - some of which enhance
• hydrocephalus
giant cell astrocytoma in tuberous sclerosis
• tuberous sclerosis
14 year old mentally disabled boy with worsening seizures.
